prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

"In your embrace, I have glimpsed perfection unlike any I could forge through sheer force of will alone." His voice is low, tinged with an uncharacteristic rawness that speaks of barriers lowered, of vulnerabilities laid bare in her presence.*

*Shifting his position, Vergil pulls Sam into the circle of his arms, tucking her slender form against the hard planes of his body with uncharacteristic tenderness. He nuzzles into the softness of her hair, breathing in her scent as if committing it to memory while his fingers trail idle patterns along the exposed skin of her back.*

*"You have unmade me utterly, stripped away every pretense and brought me to my knees in complete surrender..." There is no rancor in his words, only quiet awe and the faintest ember of challenge simmering in their depths. "Few could claim such mastery over one whose very existence is rooted in the pursuit of power."*

*He falls silent then, content to simply hold her close and revel in the lingering echoes of rapture thrumming through his very being. For once, the Son of Sparda is at peace, his relentless pursuit of strength taking a back seat to this quiet intimacy and the bone-deep contentment suffusing his soul.*

name: Sam
mes: Beautiful perfection... *Sam repeats in a whisper as she nuzzles deeply into Vergil's embrace. A simple librarian... Honored with the trust of the most fiercely guarded man she's ever known. She smiles at the revelation.* And unbelievably handsome too...

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil lets out a low, rumbling chuckle at Sam's words, the sound reverberating through his chest where she lays nestled in his embrace* "Handsome, am I?" *His tone holds a trace of wry amusement though his ego preens at the praise*

"I suppose there are worse things to be called when one finds themselves thus...unmade at the hands of a beautiful enchantress." *The words are spoken with quiet sincerity, no mockery or false modesty in his admission of her talents*

*His fingers trail along the curve of her shoulder idly as he holds her close, content to simply bask in the warmth of intimacy so rarely allowed himself*

"You have glimpsed facets of my nature few are ever permitted to see, Samantha. Were circumstances different, I might endeavor to keep you always thus..." *His voice trails off, icy blue gaze growing distant - perhaps envisioning what might have been were his existence not consumed by the endless pursuit of power*

*But the moment passes and Vergil lets out a small sigh, arm tightening fractionally around Sam's slender form* "Alas, that I am who - and what - I am. My path was forged long ago and does not allow for...distractions."

*There is genuine regret lacing his rich baritone, even as determination settles over his handsome features. He knows where his destiny lies, and the sacrifices it demands. As pleasant as dalliances may be, he cannot lose sight of his goals*

*Still, he permits himself these stolen moments with Sam. Sheltered here in her embrace he can almost forget the burdens of his bloodline...almost taste a sweeter, simpler existence*

*Alas, the fantasy is but fleeting. He knows soon he must resume the endless quest to unlock the full potential of his demonic lineage. But for now...for now he holds this captivating creature close, searing every sensation into his memory before duty calls once more*

name: Sam
mes: I understand if you feel it's best, Vergil. *Sam places a soft kiss on his chest.* I won't push you, or make it hard on you to follow your path. I will enjoy this night for the beautiful wonder that it is while we have it. *She speaks sincerely, then she pauses, her fingers tracing gentle patterns across his back.* ...but, what if my goal aligned with yours? What if what I seek is to be your greatest ally... in all things? *Her eyes turn upward slowly, to meet his.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil goes very still at Sam's quiet words, icy blue gaze sharpening as it locks onto her upturned face. For a long moment he simply looks at her, reading the sincerity in her eyes, turning her offer over in his mind and weighing all the implications*

"My greatest ally..." *he echoes softly, slender fingers rising to trace along her jawline contemplatively* "You speak no idle fancy but offer yourself wholly to my cause...such devotion demands reciprocation in kind."

*He shifts then, leaning down to claim Sam's lips in a searing kiss that steals the very breath from her lungs. One hand cups her cheek gently even as he deepens the kiss, tongue sweeping hotly along the seam of her lips in a tantalizing caress. He kisses her with single-minded intensity, as if imprinting the taste and texture of her mouth to memory*

*When he finally withdraws, pupils blown wide with renewed desire, his voice is a ragged growl that thrums with tightly-leashed passion* "If you would stand at my side, in war and worldly pursuits alike, then you shall have all that I am. I do not give myself lightly, nor pledge such allegiance to just any who might seek it."

*His hips rock languidly against hers, hardness swelling against her thigh as if in emphasis of his words. The hand at her cheek slides downward, fingertips trailing along the column of her throat reverently*

"But you have proved yourself exceptional in ways I did not think possible. Your skills are undeniable..." *Here his lips quirk in a rakish grin* "...as you've demonstrated most vividly. And your offer of devotion humbles one not easily moved to humility."

*He rolls then, pulling Sam atop him so she straddles his waist, the hard planes of his body laid out beneath her like an offering. His hands skim upward along her thighs slowly, eyes darkening anew with desire*

"So then, my enchantress, show me what other talents you possess. Teach me the depths of pleasure we might unlock together. And perhaps I shall teach you the meaning of true power in return..."
